document_data.name: Slitherhorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Slitherhorn''' was a wind instrument from [[Calimport]] that produced a peculiar reedy sound.
document_data.Description: Slitherhorn was crafted out of [[snakeskin]], shaped, stretched, and dried into a shape of long [[flute]]. The instrument was polished to appear sheeny.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, [[Cate Quirkilious]], daughter of [[Thomas C. Quirkilious]], the proprietor of [[Chromatic Scale]] musical instrument shop in [[Baldur's Gate]], encountered slitherhorns during her trip to Calimport. She was impressed by the instrument's peculiar sound and promised to bring it to the Gate and play it for her father.
